entry.title: Derry Township Board of Supervisors meeting notes for July 2020
entry.content:
https://www.derrytownship.org/government/agendas-and-minutes/board-of-supervisors-meeting-minutes
Derry Township BoS meeting is every other week on Tuesday at 7pm on Zoom and streamed on YouTube

Derry is a second-class township in PA.
https://www.legis.state.pa.us/WU01/LI/LI/US/HTM/1933/0/0069..HTM

****************************

* Derry Township transportation plan
* Green House Gases survey of sources in Derry Township
* budget shortfall due to COVID-19

Derry Township transportation plan: community members are not happy with planned changes to road width

Derry Climate Change Advisory Committee report
Primary green house gas source for Derry Township is transportation

Derry Township budget is $25,000,000
Money sources: Hershey park tourism
policing is 47% of the Derry Township budget
Derry Township workforce has been reduced by 18%; additional cuts are planned
revenue shortfall for 2019 is $2,000,000
